inclusion.criterion: Hypertension controlled or no higher than stage 1 hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Random spot urine protein/creatinine ratio of less than 0.5
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Calculated MDRD GFR of greater than or equal to 60 ml/min/1.73/m^2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No allopurinol or probenecid intake for at least one month prior to study entry
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to cooperate with study procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to travel to the GCRC at Shands Hospital for overnight inpatient stays on two separate occasions
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of malignant or accelerated hypertension
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Confirmed total white cell count of less than 2,500/mm^3, anemia, or thrombocytopenia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She has an uncomplicated pregnancy and normal vital signs.
